H0.text: Who killed Robert F Kennedy. Lee Harvey Oswald

H1.text: Who killed Robert F Kennedy. James Earl Ray

H2.text: Who killed Robert F Kennedy. Theodore White

H3.text: Who killed Robert F Kennedy. Sirhan Sirhan

A4.text: Sirhan Bishara Sirhan assassinated Senator Robert F. Kennedy on June 5, 1968.

A5.text: Sirhan was convicted of first-degree murder, among other charges, and subsequently sentenced to death by gas chamber.
